Text: What's the secret? They want to steal ALL of Palestine, destroy the Dome of the Rock mosque, rebuild their Solomon's temple, lead the USA into WWIII with Russia, China, Islamic countries or whatever to bring Armageddon so that their "savior" Satan can rule in Jerusalem.

You seemed to have the confused conservative Protestant Christian beliefs regarding the end times, derived mostly from the book of Revelation in the New Testament, with jewish beliefs. Jews as you should know don't recognize the New Testament as part of the Bible. 
So in addition to being anti ant-semite, you are an idiot in other ways too.
